name: litra-control
title: Litra Control
description: Control your Logitech Litra Glow light
author: Ghost_on_Rails

preferences.name: litraPath
preferences.title: Litra CLI Path
preferences.description: Path to the litra CLI executable

commands.name: toggle-on-off
commands.title: Toggle Light
commands.description: Toggle the Litra Glow light on or off

commands.name: set-temperature
commands.title: Set Temperature
commands.description: Set the color temperature of the Litra Glow light

commands.name: set-brightness
commands.title: Set Brightness
commands.description: Set the brightness of the Litra Glow light

commands.name: device-status
commands.title: Device Status
commands.description: View the current status of your Litra Glow light

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
